contentrichtext.text: '''Xu Yongyue''' ({{zh|s=许永跃|t=許永躍|p=Xǔ Yǒngyuè}}; born July 1942 in [[Zhenping County, Henan|Zhenping County]], [[Nanyang, Henan|Nanyang]], [[Henan]]) was the [[Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China|Minister of State Security]] of the [[People's Republic of China]] (from 1998-August 31, 2007) and is a member of the [[Central Committee of the Communist Party of China]] (CPC) (since 2002). He graduated from Beijing [[People's Public Security School]]. He joined the CPC in 1972. Xu Yongyue was the alternate member of the [[15th CPC Central Committee]] and formal member of the [[16th CPC Central Committee]]. ==References== *[http://www.chinavitae.com/biography_display.php?id=311 Xu Yongyue vita] {{S-start}} {{Succession box| before = [[Jia Chunwang]] | title = [[Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China|Minister of State Security]] | years = 1998 – 2007 | after = [[Geng Huichang]] }} {{S-end}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Xu, Yongyue | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Chinese politician | DATE OF BIRTH = 1942 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Xu, Yongyue}} [[Category:1942 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Politicians from Nanyang]] [[Category:People's Republic of China politicians from Henan]] [[Category:Communist Party of China politicians from Henan]] {{China-politician-stub}}
